## Vector4.axisNY() method

Creates a new Vector4 pointing in the negative direction of the Y axis, i.e. vec4(0, -1, 0, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNY(): Vector4;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The new vector
